name: Recycle Rush (Kelompok26)
description:
Recycle Rush is a simulator game as a subgenre of serious games. The characters in the recycle rush game can be male or female depending on the player's interests. Players can complete missions by processing plastic waste into products according to the tasks already on each map by combining waste type codes.

Recycling is the process of converting used materials into new materials with the aim of reducing waste and excess pollution

Platform: PC

Genre: Strategy game
